product.title: The Bears’ Christmas | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
It’s Christmas morning, and Santa has left Small Bear with a sled, skis, and skates in The Bears' Christmas. To make the day even more special, Papa Bear decides to show his son how to use all the new equipment. But, as usual, lessons from Papa Bear don’t go exactly as planned and the silliness snowballs. Will this still be the Bears’ best Christmas ever?

Tie-in Activity: Think of an activity or tradition you enjoyed as a child. If you can, share it with your child, adapting for age and circumstances—it’s a wonderful way to build the best memories ever.
